CLEBI.IS.summary: Ãelebi Hava Servisi A.S. provides ground handling services and fuel supplies to domestic and foreign airlines, and private cargo companies primarily in Turkey. The company operates through Ground Handling Services and Cargo and Warehouse Services segments. Its ground handling services include representation, traffic, ramp, cargo, flight operations, aircraft maintenance service, etc. The company also provides warehousing and cargo services. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Ãelebi Hava Servisi A.S. is a subsidiary of Ãelebi Havacilik Holding A.S.
